title: Looking for Team(Plat 3)
body:
HI,
My name is Bruno and i am 17 years old. I speak English and German. 

I am currently Plat 3, i can play every lane if needed but preffer playing on Midlane or in Jungle.  Well yes im not diamond, but it doesnt mean im bad. Im sure i would do as good as a diamond 4-5 player would do in a 5vs5 team. So if somone there looks out for dia players, give me chanz to prove that i am good enough.
